Miscellaneous Highlights: West Indies will face Papua New Guinea in the same day as the opener between Co-hosts USA and Canada
Others: The T20 World Cup 2024 will be held from June 2 to 29, 2024
The tournament will be co-hosted by the West Indies and the United States
The full schedule, squads, venues, telecast, and live streaming details for the T20 World Cup 2024 are provided
